description: RNA secondary structure prediction with deep learning and thermodynamic integration via Model Context Protocol (MCP)

tools.name: predict_rna_structure
tools.description: Predict RNA secondary structures using MXfold2 models
tools.example_prompt: Use predict_rna_structure with input_file @examples/data/sample_rna.fa and model "Turner"

tools.name: analyze_thermodynamics
tools.description: RNA thermodynamic analysis with Turner parameters
tools.example_prompt: Use analyze_thermodynamics with input_file @examples/data/sample_rna.fa and detailed_analysis true

tools.name: run_training_demo
tools.example_prompt: Use run_training_demo with output_dir "results/training_demo" and model_type "Mix"

tools.name: submit_model_comparison
tools.description: Compare multiple models on same dataset
tools.example_prompt: Submit model comparison for @examples/data/sample_rna.fa comparing Turner and Mix models

tools.name: submit_batch_structure_prediction
tools.example_prompt: Submit batch processing for all FASTA files in @examples/data/

tools.name: submit_large_dataset_analysis
tools.description: Analyze large datasets that require extended processing time
tools.example_prompt: Use submit_large_dataset_analysis with input_file "large_dataset.fa" and analysis_type "thermodynamic"

scripts.name: rna_structure_prediction.py
scripts.description: Predict RNA secondary structures using MXfold2 models
scripts.example_command:
mamba activate ./env_py37
python scripts/rna_structure_prediction.py --input examples/data/sample_rna.fa --output results/prediction.json --model Turner

scripts.name: model_comparison.py
scripts.description: Compare multiple models on same data

demo_data.description: Sample RNA sequences including tRNA, rRNA, hairpins for comprehensive testing
Short test sequences (2 sequences, ~30-50 nucleotides) for rapid testing
